name: Tales of Grumville: A Legendary Pie and A Nameless Statue
name_original: Tales of Grumville: A Legendary Pie and A Nameless Statue
description:
The small town of Grumville is many things to many people. To some, it is the heart of all of things wonderful and mysterious. To others, it is the land of dreams no longer dreamed about. To little Audrey, it is her new home and "the ugliest, most boring town in the whole freaking world".

Follow her journey as she tries to fight boredom in her small new town, comes across a mysterious statue whose name has been lost in time and stumbles upon perhaps the greatest adventure of her life (so far).

Tales of Grumville is a kinetic visual novel made by Mushroomallow Studio in collaboration with Wenderly Games. It's made for Nanoreno 2022 event. 

CONTENT WARNING: The game deals with the subjects of death and grief. Please be cautious if you're sensitive to these things.

  • Format: Visual Novel 
  • Genre: Slice of life, Adventure
  • Length: 7000 words
  • Language: English
  • Platform: PC (Windows, Mac, Linux), Android
  • Lead Artist: Mushroomallow
  • Writer: Jerry Becerril
  • BGM and SFX composer: Cassie Mann
  • UI implementation and scripter: Mad Scientist
  • Voice Actor Mixing and Mastering: Eliana
  • Audrey's VA: Vera Tan
  • Montgomery's VA: Branden Floyd
  • Rocky's VA: Grant Corvin

Privacy Policy: We do not collect any data from user
